name: SMART Stick
description: Bionic devices weren't out of my selves, this of one of the kind. This ain't connected to internet, its connected to the human who is using it :). It has touch tones, technically a virbration, and several sensors that would guide a blind person to walk safely on road. This one was a hobbist project for electronics club of sastra in which I was a member for 3 years.
